p: PI with high Mw (1,000,000 g/mol) and with low Mw (<1,000,000 g/mol) is formed in guayule stems, branches and roots [ 36, 49]. A water-based process allows to recover PI chains up to 3,000,000 g/mol [ 50]. Natural PI chains can be ended by linked phospholipids, fatty acids and their derivatives. They could potentially stiffen the structure [ 51].
